objectives: Students will discuss food and dining out using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Business/Corporate themed scenarios related to food and dining out
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining food and dining out content with Business/Corporate narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore food and dining out through a Business/Corporate lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a corporate or business challenge involving food and dining out

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to food and dining out in a business context
Students engage in business themed role-play about food and dining out using formal register
Students create original business themed content about food and dining out in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe food and dining out in a Business/Corporate scenario?
What strategy or negotiation might be involved in food and dining out?
Can you create a Business/Corporate story about food and dining out?
How does food and dining out change when viewed through a Business/Corporate perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this business scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Business/Corporate situation involving food and dining out
roles: Character A: Using formal register in business context
Character B: Responding in formal register within business theme

topic_genre_blend: food and dining out with strategy
food and dining out with negotiation
food and dining out with stakeholder

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Business/Corporate theme: Professional scenarios, workplace situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Business/Corporate themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
